mapper.select: select count(1) as deviceSum,sum(cast((case when ConnectStatus='-1' then '1' else '0' end) as int)) as offLine, sum(cast((case when ConnectStatus='1' then '1' else '0' end) as int)) as onLine from DeviceUnit;
SELECT DeviceEnabled, InstallLocation, ControlSN, ip, port FROM dbo.DeviceUnit WHERE ControlSN=#{ControlSN}
